column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Parmesan-crusted meatloaf bites (4.5/5): Ma
column2: the meatloaf! I'm not a meatloaf guy so I typically never order a dish like this. It was highly recommended by the staff
column4: and they were right. The breading really did it here as the bites were nice and crispy. Some of the best meatloaf I've ever had and it was complemented by a nice sauce. We're starting to see a trend here. Bosscat is all about dipping sauces.
